content:
Intent "Create Fruit"

Slot: "Type"
Possible Values: [Apple, Pear, Grape, Orange, Banana]

Slot: "Amount"
Possible Values: [One, A Couple, Many]


Intent "Create Metal Bobble"

Slot: "Material"
Possible Values: [Iron, Steel, Silver, Gold]

Slot: "Shape"
Possible Values: [Sphere, Cube, Spike]


Intent "Create Chaos"

Slot: "Color"
Possible Values: [N/A]

Slot: "Taste"
Possible Values: [N/A]


Intent "Create Sensation"

Slot: "Type"
Possible Values: [Happiness, Anguish, Fear, Boredom]

Slot: "Intensity'
Possible Values: [Minor, Major]

It is the beginning of time. A primordial being sits at what will one day be the center of the universe but for now, it is all there is. As the first few seconds of existence passes, the lack of anything other than itself sets in for the being. It decides to pull something from nothing to pass the dawning eternity. It decides to create something physical and material. 

Above is an Utterance. The list of intents above it is what the being could create. Classify the possible intents that could fit the above utterance. Output in JSON.
